summary: Replaces the boring blue sigils found in Shalidor's Maze with new colourful ones based on their School of Magic. Also serves as a modder's resource.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=6][color=#980000]C[/color][color=#ff0000]O[/color][color=#ff7700]L[/color][color=#ffff00]O[/color][color=#00ff00]U[/color][color=#00ffff]R[/color][color=#1e84cc]F[/color][color=#0000ff]U[/color][color=#9900ff]L [/color][color=#a2c4c9]SIGILS[/color]
[/size][/b][url=https://www.patreon.com/po3blazingdarkness]Patreon link
[/url]
[size=3][heading][color=#00ffff]Description[/color][/heading] [/size]
[size=2]All sigils found in Shalidor's Maze glow blue in vanilla. Pretty plain, and boring. This mod revamps them with new colours based on their School of Magic.

[list]
[*]Alteration - [color=#00ff00]Green [/color]
[*][color=#efefef]Conjuration - [/color][color=#9900ff]Purple[/color]
[*][color=#ffffff]Destruction - [/color][color=#ff0000]Red[/color]
[*][color=#ffffff]Restoration - [/color][color=#ffff00]Yellow[/color]
[/list]
[color=#ffffff]Sigil of Illusion is not replaced so it will remain blue.

[/color][heading][color=cyan]Compatibility[/color][/heading][color=#ffffff]
[/color][/size][size=2][list][*]Incompatible with any mesh replacers that edit [i]magicstonealteration01[/i], [i]magicstoneconjuration01[/i], [i]magicstonedestruction01 [/i]and [i]magicstonerestoration01[/i]
[/list][/size][size=2]
[heading][color=cyan]Permissions[/color][/heading]
[/size][list][*][size=2]Feel free to use this as a modder's resource. Credit is appreciated but not required.[/size]
[/list][list]
[/list][b]
[/b][size=2]Peace out.[/size]
author: powerofthree
